thread.title: Cop comforts lost boy, photo goes viral
thread.title_full: Cop comforts lost boy, photo goes viral | www.ajc.com

author: Cox Media Group National Content Desk
title: Cop comforts lost boy, photo goes viral
text:
A Texas police officer's act of kindness toward a lost little boy has gone viral.
David Taylor was captured in a photo, carrying around a child who had become separated from his mother during a festival.
>> Read more trending stories
Taylor carried him around for about 30 minutes, KLFY reported.
Photo of Crowley Police officer carrying lost boy goes viral https://t.co/HdDcIjpxBM pic.twitter.com/8jtW8VqfA5
â€” KLFY NEWS 10 (@KLFY) October 20, 2015 The boy was so comforted by Taylor that he fell asleep in his arms.
Taylor told KFLY that he was just doing his job.
